snippet.title: NIVA Teaser
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW!

NIVA is a pacifistic exploration art game. The player slips into the role of a mighty forest god to restore the harmony in a mesmerizing forest. NIVA's scenic art style, relaxing music and simple but intriguing game mechanics invite to have a rest from the stressful everyday life.

It's for free and for the ones who enjoyed our game and would like to support us and future projects we give the option to donate. Donations over 5$ will receive the digital soundtrack of the game.

Official Website: www.nivagame.com
facebook: www.facebook.com/nivagame
Twitter: twitter.com/NIVAgame
